title: In second audition. If they will ask me to sing even though I only dance. Can you recommend songs for me to sing? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m not a professional singer, but find a song you enjoy hearing yourself sing and that you feel represents you. If you aren’t for high notes, I would definitely use a toned down song(is that even the right phrase?). For some suggestions, I think any song from Halsey’s Badlands album would be great. and the things you can do to make the song suit you…the possibilities are endless.
When I'm Gone (Cups) by Anna Kendrick makes most of the people sound better than they actually are and it's not hard. You can try it. Good luck with your audition 💙
